price: 244. En vecht op het pad van Allah en weet dat Allah de Alhorende, de Alwetende is.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waqātilū fī sabīli al-lahi wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
